item.title: REST API 设计面试
item.description: Below is my own preparation for REST API interview. Hope it’s helpful for you if you are looking for job that focus a lot on REST API design capability. Principle Self-describing Simple Safe Clarification (WHO) Identify users Internal or External Roles (Developer, Admin, Customer, Support…) (HOW) Identify scenario, use cases (WHAT) What functionality or resource will be exposed by API Clarify and confirm above and continue to API design Note:
